attributes.action: charge email at 0.1p per email thus eliminating spam
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If I had to pay 0.1p per email it would be OK for all the emails I wanted to send.

But for mass spammers (phishing attacks, 419ers, drugs, porn) it would stop them instantly - they could not afford to email millions of people every day.

Just like the post.  I still get some junk mail, but not as much as the spam I get.

And email fraud (phishing) would go down - there's hopefully a net economic benefit.
